Destiny 2 has an excellent tutorial that will teach you the very basics. You will be introduced to a guardian called Shaw Han, who will enlist you in a few basic missions that will help you understand the core concepts of the game. While he is missing members of his strike team, he is still a very capable teacher, especially to Newbies. I recommend doing all of his missions.

Shaw Han says, "Click the target to move on!"
